type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Set Texture

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/set_texture).

A power that sets an entity's base texture.

Type ID: `apugli:set_texture`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Set Texture

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/set_texture).

A power that sets an entity's base texture.

Type ID: `apugli:set_texture`



---

texture_location.description: Where the new texture is located.
texture_location.markdownDescription: Where the new texture is located.

player_model.description: The player model to associate with the player entity. One of `default` or `slim`. This only works for player entities.
player_model.markdownDescription: The player model to associate with the player entity. One of `default` or `slim`. This only works for player entities.
